coded_answer.p: Dear Sir/Madam
I am so pleased to know that I have won such an amazing prize in your competition. I would like to answer the questions you request fromaskhave asked me.
Firstly, I should say that I would like to travel in July because of thisthat is the month wichwhich I could moremost likely have off atfrom work for goingto go on holiday.

Secondly, I would prefer to stay atin a log cabinslog cabin rather than a tentstent. That is because, I do not want to seem fuzyfussy, but I like to have some comoditiescommoditiesluxuries when I am going on holiday and I think sleppingsleeping overon the floor without electricity it may annoy me.

Finally, I would like to choose swimming as my activity in the Camp. I love swimming and also I should say that I am very good at this sport because I have been doing thatit for a long time. On the contraryConversely, painting is an activity wichwhich I have never tryiedtried before, so that I have not any skill in drawing but I would like startto start doing that knownow when I have the chance. So that is my second choice.

On the other hand, I would like to know some imformationinformation wichwhich could be useful inon my holiday like: whichwhat type of clothes couldwould be more suitable for me in the Camp? Could I need some extra money? Do I need to bring somethinganything else? If is so, please let me know as soon as possible.
to looklooking forward to getting your Reply
Yours sincerely
Dear friend.
I am writtingwriting to tell you about my experience inat the last month pop concertpop concert last month, where I was helping my friend Nick, who was the bouncer ofat the placevenue.
ThatIt was a pop concert with lots of famous singers like Madona, Julio Iglesias, and people like them
ThatIt was a charity concert to saveraise money tofor poor people ofin AFRICA.

My job it was to accomodateaccommodate to the people of the main sit of the theathretheatre. Of course those places were reserved just for people well-knowedwell-knownwell-known people who wanted to help by joinedjoiningattending the concert.
So I had to ask them for their identificationsidentification and for their invitations. After that, I havehad to take them to their respective sitseatseats.
At first, I was a bit scarescared, I mean, I was afraid of not bebeing good enough to havedo a good performancewell as an assistant; but finally every thingeverything went well.

I should say that it was the easiest and moremost interesting job that I have ever done. I really enjoyed it and also I did not miss the opportunity to ask the artist to take a phothophotohave his photo taken with me.
So, I hope to see you earliestsoon to show you all my phothosphotos.
I think, it was very cleaverclever of me to record that moment wichwhich I will never ever forget, and that was the thinkthing that I moremost likedliked most ofabout that experience.
Looking forward to getting your reply and to seeing you soon
lots of love
